name: trio-business-qafrontend
description: This is a UI automation project developed using Playwright and TypeScript.

scripts.test-dev: TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test-stg: TEST_ENV=stg npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test-prod: TEST_ENV=prod npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test-dev: TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test-stg: TEST_ENV=sit npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test-prod: TEST_ENV=prod npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report

author: Mahendiran M
